title: Copy even values from originalList to newList

content.prompt: Which of the following changes, if any, can be made so that the code segment works as intended?

choices.label: Changing line 1 to FOR EACH number IN newList
No change is needed; the code segment is correct as is.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and correct errors in algorithms and programs, including error discovery through testing.
